scripts.test:newman: newman run HelpDesk_Tests_Corrected.postman_collection.json -e HelpDesk_Environment.postman_environment.json -d data.json -r cli,html,json --reporter-html-export reports/newman-report.html --reporter-json-export reports/newman-results.json
scripts.test:newman:watch: newman run HelpDesk_Tests_Corrected.postman_collection.json -e HelpDesk_Environment.postman_environment.json -d data.json -r cli,html,json --reporter-html-export reports/newman-report.html --reporter-json-export reports/newman-results.json --delay-request 2000
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:newman
